attributes.action: bring in the death sentence for terrorists, murderers and pedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that if the death sentence was introduced to get rid of murderers, pedophiles and anyone ploting terror attacks against our country, it would be the biggest solution to ease overcrouding in prisons. It would also make people think twice about carrying out such acts.

rejection.details: there are already lots of petitions on this subject
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
